item.title: Java/Spring
item.description: @RequestParam Object binding To enable details in health API management.endpoint.health.show-details=always To switch profile Via command line --spring.profiles.active=dev Via environment variable spring_profiles_active=dev Java heap dump sudo su <user running the java process> jmap -dump:live,format=b,file=/tmp/<file>.hprof <pid> Get Mime Type in Java https://www.baeldung.com/java-file-mime-type
